overview:
Om Thoke is a dynamic cyber entrepreneur, blogger, web programmer, and an SEO specialist.

He has been inclined towards writing since his child-hood days, and from 9th standard he started writing small articles and stories that appeared in local magazines and newspapers like “The Times of India”.

He became the State Level topper in 12th Std [PUC] in CBSE exams for scoring 93/100 in English, and finished his higher secondary education from M.G.M. School, Bhilai.

He did his B.E. from SSEC, Bangalore in Electronics & Communication Engineering, and worked for a few IT companies as a software engineer, but he was more interested in SEO and Blogging.

During his college days, he started several tech blogs like www.latest-technews.com www.c-cplusplus.com (and many more!) and soon got recognized as a professional blogger, and started learning SEO to get his blogs recognized by search engines.

In 2009, he founded Webfosys Networks Pvt Ltd, an organic SEO, content writing, web programming, and IT service providing firm, which soon became one of the best Indian SEO companies over a short span of 2 years.

He recently started Xpress SEO Solutions, another specialized SEO training and online marketing company based in Bangalore, India.

Currently, he runs hundreds of blogs, and works as Managing Director of Webfosys Networks Pvt Ltd, CEO of Xpress SEO Solutions, and provides SEO training to fresh aspirants who want to make it big in this field.

He writes for About Inc, subsidiary of NY Times, and many other prestigious online magazines, local publications, as well as communities like BrightHub, Associated Content, eHow and he’s a platinum level ezine author.

His passions are singing, playing guitar, keyboard, drums, PS2/PC games, driving sports cars, superbikes and blogging 24x7!

external_links.title: Om Thoke Bio  - Web Hosting Guide - About Inc - A NY Times Subsidiary
